# DbVieweR an R package for database management

DbVieweR is a Shiny app that simulates a database management system, featuring functions like login/logout, save/create/delete tables, and add/rename columns.

<div style="text-align: left">
<h6>Description</h6>
<hr>
<p>

Highlights of this app:
    <br><br>
    - Back-end database: Utilizes SQLite or PostgreSQL for storing dummy data.<br>
    - Authorization: Incorporates the shinyauthr package to add an authentication layer to the app.<br>
    <br><br>
    Features of the app:
    <br><br>
    - Save tables: Store sales summary tables in the database.<br>
    - Update existing tables: Rename tables or columns.<br>
    - Create new tables: Customize table and column names, with options for integer, float, varchar(255), and boolean columns.<br>
    - Create entries: Add entries to tables with customizable column types.<br>
    - Delete tables: Accessible only with specific authorization.<br>
    - Robustness: Defense mechanism prevents duplicates, invalid expressions, and conflicts with SQL keywords.<br>
    <br><br>
    Check out the project on <a href="https://github.com/munoztd0/DbVieweR">GitHub</a>.
</p>
